name: 耿繼業
objective:
A、複數及複數解析函數(complex number and analytic function)
B、複數積分(complex integration)
C、羃級數、Taylor與Laurent 級數(power series,Taylor and Luarent series)
D、餘數積分法(residue integration)
E、保角映射(conformal mapping)
schedule:
第一週~第四週
A、複數及複數解析函數(complex number and analytic function)
1.複數(complex number )
2.複數的極式、乘冪與根(polar form of complex number.powers and roots)
3.複數平面上的曲線和區域(curves and regions in the complex plane)
4.複數函數與解析函數(complex variable function and analytic function)
5.Cauchy-Riemann 方程式(Cauchy-Riemann equations)
6.指數、對數、三角函數與雙曲現函數(exponential function.logarithm function.trigonometric function.hyperbolic function)
第五週~第七週
B、複數積分(complex integration)
1.複數平面上的線積分(line integral in the complex plane)
2.Cauchy積分定理(Cauchy's integral theorem)
3.Cauchy積分公式(Cauchy's integral formula)
4.解析函數的導數(derivatives of analytic function)
第八週~第十二週
C、羃級數、Taylor 級數與 Laurent 級數(power series,Taylor and Luarent series)
1.序列、及數與收斂測試(sequences,series,convergence tests)
2.羃級數(power series)
3.以羃級數表示之函數(functions given by power series)
4.Taylor 級數(Taylor's series)
5.羃級數：實用方法(power series:practical methods)
6.Laurent 級數(Laurent's series)
第十三週~第十五週
D、餘數積分法(residue integration)
1.奇異點及零點(singularities and zeros)
2.餘數(residue)
3.餘數定理(residue theorem)
4.實數積分的計算(evaluation of real integrals)
5.Laplace 逆轉換(  Laplace inverse transformation)
第十六週~第十七週
E、保角映射(conformal mapping)
1.保角映射(conformal mapping)
2.線性轉換(linear transformation)
3.保角映射應用(applications of conformal mapping)
scorePolicy:
1、總成績為小考 、期中考、期末考平均得之(Point scale is based on the average of midterm ,semester test and some quizzes.)
2、作業、出席率為調整總成績之參考(Final score will be modified by homework and class attendance.)
